1449340.name: Professional Farmer: Cattle and Crops - Digital Supporter Pack
1449340.description:
The Professional Farmer: Cattle and Crops Digital Support Package gives access to a variety of digital goodies and enhances your farming experience with exclusive content such as international editions of Farmer's magazines, extensive tutorial videos and the original soundscape.

Artbook
A beautiful digital Artbook is showing you many details about the development of the game.

Original Soundscape
Enjoy harmonious sounds that give you the feeling of being immersed in the wide fields and meadows.

Current publications of agricultural engineering magazines
Browse international editions of the renowned agricultural machinery magazine "profi" and the current German edition of the agricultural machinery magazine "Stark".

Digital world map
The whole world at a glance - the digital world map gives you an overview of the large and lovingly designed world that awaits you in Professional Farmer: Cattle and Crops.

4K Wallpapers
Exclusive backgrounds display massive machines in beautiful sceneries on your screen.

Tutorial Videos
Whether you have questions about how to use the machines or would like an overview of the possibilities that Professional Farmer: Cattle and Crops offers you - the tutorial videos are always available.

Access to the digital goodies
All digital goodies can be found in the Steam installation directory of the game in the folder "Digital Supporter Pack Content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Cattle and Crops) after the download of the "Digital Supporter Pack" DLC package is completed.
